segments.text: you said it . Good beer , good music , and on top of that , there are so many hot girls here !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm with you on that . Check out that one over there . I think I'm in love !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , she's alright , but not really my cup of tea . What about the blond with the red dress ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: oh , that's Janice . She's just new in town . You have a thing for blonds , eh ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yeah ! She could do anything she wants to me !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I bet . Why not go over and talk to her ? She's really nice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think so . I get so nervous talking to girls . I always put my foot in my mouth , scare her off , and end up looking like a real fool . Besides , she is way out of my league .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: come on ! Man up ! You'll never know until you try .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: okay okay , just let me have another cup of beers to get my head in the game .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: all right . But I think you ought to move soon .

segments.text: I can see five other guys eying her up .
